name: nextjstypescript
description: Next JS TypeScript for Torizon template

scripts.output-arm64: npm run build && rm -rf out && mkdir -p out && cp -r .next/standalone/* ./out && cp package.json ./out && npm i --prefix ./out --omit=dev --target_arch=arm64
scripts.output-arm: npm run build && rm -rf out && mkdir -p out && cp -r .next/standalone/* ./out && cp package.json ./out && npm i --prefix ./out --omit=dev --target_arch=arm
scripts.output-amd64: npm run build && rm -rf out && mkdir -p out && cp -r .next/standalone/* ./out && cp package.json ./out && npm i --prefix ./out --omit=dev --target_arch=x64

author: Escherstair
